entity.name: content
entity.query: SELECT CONCAT('content-',id) AS identifier, id, title, slug, excerpt, body, section, metaKeywords AS keywords, publishState, 'sitecontent' AS type FROM content

entity.name: news
entity.query: SELECT CONCAT('news-',id) AS identifier, id, title, title AS slug, contents AS body, summary AS excerpt, datePublished AS created, keywords, primaryNewsLocation AS place, CONCAT(latitude,',',longitude) AS coordinates, latitude, longitude, 'news' AS section, woeid, publish_state AS publishState, 'news' AS type FROM news

entity.name: help
entity.query: SELECT CONCAT('help-',id) AS identifier, id, title, excerpt, slug, body, section, metaKeywords AS keywords, publishState, 'help' AS type FROM help

entity.name: staff
entity.query: SELECT CONCAT('staff-',id) AS identifier, id, CONCAT(firstname,' ',lastname) AS title, CONCAT(firstname,'-',lastname) AS slug, CONCAT(address_1,' ',address_2,' ',town,' ',postcode) AS place, profile AS body, 'profiles' AS section, alumni AS publishState, 'staff' AS type, woeid, latitude, longitude, CONCAT(latitude,',',longitude) AS coordinates FROM staff WHERE alumni = '1'

entity.name: research
entity.query: SELECT CONCAT('research-',researchprojects.id) AS identifier, researchprojects.title, researchprojects.id, investigator AS slug, description AS body, 'research' AS section, projecttypes.title AS type, researchprojects.created, researchprojects.updated FROM researchprojects LEFT JOIN projecttypes ON researchprojects.level = projecttypes.id

entity.name: events
entity.query: SELECT CONCAT('events-',events.id) AS identifier, eventTitle AS title, events.id, eventTitle AS slug, eventDescription AS body, 'events' AS section, eventtypes.type AS type, events.created, events.updated, latitude, longitude, CONCAT(latitude,',',longitude) AS coordiantes, eventLocation AS place FROM events LEFT JOIN eventtypes ON events.eventType = eventtypes.id

entity.name: vacancies
entity.query: SELECT CONCAT('vacancies-',vacancies.id) AS identifier, title, vacancies.id, title AS slug, specification AS body, 'vacancies' AS section, staffregions.description AS type, vacancies.created FROM vacancies LEFT JOIN staffregions ON vacancies.regionID = staffregions.regionID
